title: Chapter 4418 - Chapter 4418: 44.17 Million Years Of Battle, Killing Them One By One
body:
Chapter 4418 - Chapter 4418: 44.17 Million Years Of Battle, Killing Them One By One

Chapter 4418: 44.17 million years of battle, killing them one by one

“Kill!”

A terrifying battle broke out.

The kings of the gods who believed in the universe saw that they had no way to escape.

They saw that the Dragon King of the Dragon Palace was going to fight them to the death.

Their faces were filled with determination.

Kill!

There was no way to escape!

The battle between the kings of the gods was exactly what Wang Xian wanted.

After breaking through to the primal chaos realm, this was the first time he was able to have such a satisfying battle.

A great battle broke out!

The great battle continued!

The only advantage of the kings of the gods who believed in the universe was that they had the power of faith, allowing them to fuse and battle more.

On the other hand, Wang Xian and the rest had the advantage.

They had a strong advantage.

The intense collision continued in the belief universe.

All the experts were giving it their all.

Wang Xian also unleashed all his strength.

The great battle continued day by day.

“Not good, my strength has dropped. The Gods of our Qianyuan Palace are being hunted crazily. My realm has dropped!”

A few years later, on the side of the king of the gods, the Qianyuan Palace master shouted in horror.

His words made all the kings of the gods’expressions sink.

But they couldn’t do anything about it.

The Dragon Palace and the others were completely suppressing them.

They had to maintain their peak combat strength at all times.

“Order all the gods to escape immediately. Don’t gather together and don’t be killed by the disciples of the Dragon Palace!”

Palace master Shen Yi ordered with an ugly expression.

“Yes!”

The kings of the gods immediately replied.

The battle continued.

However, in the belief universe, Prime Minister Gui led the disciples of the Dragon Palace and chased after the gods one by one.

With the power of the Dragon Palace, the gods couldn’t resist at all.

“Our king of the gods is completely restrained by the experts of the Dragon Palace. A terrible battle is happening in the center. The Dragon Palace is too powerful. We have to escape separately.”

“Hiss, how can a force in the universe be so powerful? How is this possible? The power of the battle coming from the center is too terrifying!”

“Believe in our king of the gods. They will definitely expel the Dragon Palace.”

The entire belief universe was boiling.

Countless gods began to flee frantically.

The terrifying battle coming from the center shocked everyone!

Even though they were very far away, they could still feel the aura that made them almost despair.

It was too terrifying!

The gods of the belief universe were fleeing in different directions, which indeed reduced the hunting speed of the disciples of the Dragon Palace.

However, they continued to hunt down the gods one by one.

Every year, many gods died at the hands of the disciples of the Dragon Palace.

The belief universe was engulfed by war.

One thousand years, two thousand years, three thousand years…

At the center of the battlefield, the war continued.

The endurance of a powerhouse in the Heaven’s origin realm was extremely terrifying.

The intensity of this war was at its maximum.

The attack power was at its maximum.

The violent attacks continued without any reduction.

The injuries on Wang Xian’s body gradually increased.

However, these injuries were not fatal or serious.

Compared to Wang Xian, the kings of Pantheon were much more miserable.

Out of the twenty kings of pantheon, less than half of them had their strength reduced during this period of time.

Now, all of their faces were extremely pale. They felt like they were at the end of their rope.

The battle had been going on for more than 9,000 years!

The continuous battle for nearly 10,000 years had weakened their power of faith by a lot.

Their bodies were trembling and there was a hint of despair on their faces.

At this moment, the experts from the Dragon Palace surrounded them.

Every attack caused their bodies to tremble violently.

From time to time, some kings of the gods spat out blood.

After fighting for nearly 10,000 years, Wang Xian and the rest did not give the kings of gods any chance to escape.

There was only one possibility for them to escape, and that was to escape one by one.

It was impossible for them to escape as a whole.

They could not attack at all times!

“PFFT!”

At this moment, the first God Palace master suddenly spat out a large amount of fresh blood.

“Not good, my realm has dropped. Many of the Gods of my first God Palace are being massacred!”

The first God Palace master roared in fear.

At this moment, he was truly panicking.

Previously, he had already absorbed the power of faith of the kings of the gods, and his strength had reached two great dao realms.

But now, his strength had once again returned to a Great Dao realm.

His strength had decreased rapidly.

Furthermore, he had a bad premonition about the current situation.

He was probably done for.

“Lord God One Palace Master, I can’t hold on any longer. The power of faith in my body has been exhausted!”

At this moment, another piece of bad news came.

“Lord God One Palace Master, I can’t hold on any longer either. The energy in my body can only hold on for a few more hours at most!”

“I’m also running out of energy!”

The early-stage kings of the gods couldn’t hold on any longer.

After fighting for close to 10,000 years, their energy was running out.

“Die!”A total of 10 early-stage kings of the gods roared in fear!

Their words made everyone’s hearts sink.

A few hours passed in the blink of an eye. The massive belief giant started to shrink and its energy started to thin out.

“Their strength is decreasing rapidly. Let’s kill them all in one go!”

Wang Xian sensed the change in the giant of faith and shouted loudly!

Boom

He waved his dragon claw. This time, he easily broke through the giant of Faith’s defense.

Following the depletion of the energy of the nearly ten newly-entered king of Pantheon, the giant of faith could no longer resist Wang Xian.

“Hehehe, kill them, kill them!”

Mo Sha and the rest had excited looks in their eyes as they charged forward.

Cracks appeared on the belief giants’bodies as cracks appeared one after another.

Mo Sha and the kings of the void charged forward and approached the kings of the gods.

“Boom!”

Wang Xian opened his huge dragon mouth and spat out a mouthful of dragon breath, directly crushing the head of the belief giants!

The giant of faith had collapsed!

“It’s over!”

When the kings of gods saw the experts of the Dragon Palace attacking, their faces were filled with despair.

Wang Xian’s golden eyes locked onto the king of gods. A terrifying ray of light shot towards him.

Thump

The king of gods sensed the attack and wanted to order the kings of gods to join hands to block it.

However, at this moment, every king of the gods suffered a terrifying attack.

They couldn’t care about anything else.

Faced with the terrifying golden rays, the first God Palace Master couldn’t resist at all!

His body was directly penetrated and his life force dissipated!

At this point, the first God Palace Master, who believed in the universe supreme master, was completely destroyed.

What awaited them next was the pursuit of Wang Xian!
